title: Great Smoky Mountains National Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Great Smoky Mountains National Park offers teachers a wide variety of fun and free curriculum-based programs. Our park programs enhance classroom learning by using the cultural and natural resources as teaching tools. Through place-based learning, students make real-world connections with science and history, while having fun at the same time! All Curriculum Materials   Featured Lesson Plan    Salamander Research Learn More     Field Trips Planning a field trip can be a challenging experience. The park has education staff in both North Carolina and Tennessee who can help navigate the process. All Field Trips   Plan A Fieldtrip    Bring Your Class to the Park! Learn More     Institutes & Field Schools Great Smoky Mountains Institute at Tremont and the Smoky Mountains Field School offer workshops and programs for everyone from school students to senior citizens.
